module.title: App: Site
module.description: Empty web site application as base for your projects.
module.log: Added robots file and locked log folder.
Using new script auto load level support to load layout.css at last.
Adjusted .htaccess for newer Apache: strict option switches.
Added version and hook to use version to solve browser cache problems.
Dispatching is done by hook App::onAppDispatch by now.
Extended master template by support for links defined in config/pages.json.
Extended master template by support for navigation helper for pages.
Updated master template to get brand from main locale.
load index HTML files by arguments.
Replace file and folder class calls to use CeusMedia:Common.
module.author: Christian Würker
module.hook: $config = $env->getConfig(); // shortcut configuration if( !$config->get( 'app.revision' ) ){ // no revision set in base app configuration $version = $config->get( 'module.app_site.version' ); // get version from module App:Site if( version_compare( $version, 0 ) === 1 ){ // a version (greater than 0) has been set $context->css->primer->setRevision( $version ); // set version as revision on primer CSS collector $context->css->theme->setRevision( $version ); // set version as revision on theme CSS collector $context->js->setRevision( $version ); // set version as revision on JavaScript collector } }
